Josiah Burgess Computer Science

About Me

I am a student currently studying for my A-levels in 2025 at St Ivo sixth form in cambridgeshire. I am currently studying mathematics, further mathematics, computer science and economics. I have had a lifelong interest and passion for maths and I have more recently become very interested in computer science. I am most interested in neural networks as well as the maths underlying and the potential economic impact that AI could have.

Although I am planning to study computer science after sixth form, I am aiming to persue all of my subjects to as high of a level as I can.

What is this website for?
